thread.section_title: Flystein Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flystein | flystein.com
thread.title: Trez

author: Trez
title: Trez
text: I'm a former Darjeelin customer that switched to Flystein after Darjeelin suspended operations. Honestly, as a customer I liked Darjeelin's system better because the upfront fee was very small, but it looks like their business model wasn't working. It took me a few days to work up the nerve to pay Flystein's €44 fee up front, but I'm glad I did because I wound up saving €85 (after the fee) on an already low price and got a slightly more convenient itinerary to boot. David, the flight expert who found my itinerary, was very helpful and even taught me a few tricks!
